entry.source: 〉 The fairies have gathered{F801}together...{F801}{F802}〉 You recognize a woman approaching{F801}you...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The fairies have gathered{F801}together...{F801}{F802}〉 You recognize a woman approaching{F801}you...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684000}Thanks, {F843,0}.{F801}I knew you'd come to help me.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684001}I had a feeling this was going to be{F801}a tough one, but...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684002}I'm sure with your help, {F843,0},{F801}we'll make it through this okay.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684000}Thanks, {F843,0}.{F801}I knew you'd come to help me.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684001}I had a feeling this was going to be{F801}a tough one, but...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684002}I'm sure with your help, {F843,0},{F801}we'll make it through this okay.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-234}{F813,0,684007}Let me explain the situation.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684008}You see, we fairy folks are the{F801}Tuatha De Denann...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684009}That is, our people are descendants{F801}of the Lady Danu.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684010}We would like Lady Danu to return and{F801}rule us again, as the mother of the{F801}fairy people.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684011}Then, we can regain the authority and{F801}faith that we used to have.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684012}You might have realized this by now,{F801}but "Black Maria" is Lady Danu in{F801}another form.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684013}Back when the Hebrew holy race began{F801}to encroach upon our world...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684014}Lady Danu became part of the Judeo-{F801}Christian canon by merging with an{F801}interpretation of Mary.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684015}She did this to protect us fairies,{F801}her children, from oppression by those{F801}awful beings...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-234}{F813,0,684007}Let me explain the situation.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684008}You see, we fairy folks are the{F801}Tuatha De Denann...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684009}That is, our people are descendants{F801}of the Lady Danu.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684010}We would like Lady Danu to return and{F801}rule us again, as the mother of the{F801}fairy people.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684011}Then, we can regain the authority and{F801}faith that we used to have.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684012}You might have realized this by now,{F801}but "Black Maria" is Lady Danu in{F801}another form.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684013}Back when the Hebrew holy race began{F801}to encroach upon our world...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684014}Lady Danu became part of the Judeo-{F801}Christian canon by merging with an{F801}interpretation of Mary.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684015}She did this to protect us fairies,{F801}her children, from oppression by those{F801}awful beings...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-248}{F813,0,684016}But I have heard Maria's voice.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684017}She said that if we asked the human{F801}named Nozomi, then we will be able to{F801}see her again.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684018}Black Maria said that Nozomi can save{F801}us all.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-248}{F813,0,684016}But I have heard Maria's voice.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684017}She said that if we asked the human{F801}named Nozomi, then we will be able to{F801}see her again.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684018}Black Maria said that Nozomi can save{F801}us all.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684019}So, that's the story, {F843,0}.{F801}They really need me.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684020}I'd love to help them.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684021}Even if the angels try to stop me, I{F801}at least want to let these guys talk{F801}to Maria.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684022}You'll help me, right, {F843,0}?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684019}So, that's the story, {F843,0}.{F801}They really need me.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684020}I'd love to help them.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684021}Even if the angels try to stop me, I{F801}at least want to let these guys talk{F801}to Maria.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684022}You'll help me, right, {F843,0}?{F801}

entry.source: "Of course I will."{F801}"No, I won't."{F801}
entry.target: "Of course I will."{F801}"No, I won't."{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684026}You know I'm always grateful for your{F801}assistance, {F843,0}.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684027}Well, I'm going to start the summoning{F801}program now.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684028}I want you to stall the angels while{F801}it's summoning, {F843,0}.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684029}I'll summon Black Maria while you keep{F801}them at bay.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684030}Are you ready?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684026}You know I'm always grateful for your{F801}assistance, {F843,0}.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684027}Well, I'm going to start the summoning{F801}program now.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684028}I want you to stall the angels while{F801}it's summoning, {F843,0}.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684029}I'll summon Black Maria while you keep{F801}them at bay.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684030}Are you ready?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684033}All right, let's do it.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684033}All right, let's do it.{F801}

entry.target: 〉 Nozomi begins manipulating her{F801}smartphone...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 You feel a chill.{F801}You sense a strong power nearby...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 You feel a chill.{F801}You sense a strong power nearby...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Monotone voice\0{F87A,-78}{F813,0,684034}We forbid this summoning...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Monotone voice\0{F87A,-78}{F813,0,684034}We forbid this summoning...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684023}I see... Well, I know it is asking a{F801}bit much.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684024}I'm sorry for getting you involved in{F801}all this.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684025}Well, don't worry. I'll manage on my{F801}own, somehow.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684023}I see... Well, I know it is asking a{F801}bit much.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684024}I'm sorry for getting you involved in{F801}all this.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684025}Well, don't worry. I'll manage on my{F801}own, somehow.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684035}Hey, {F843,0}. Are you here to help?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684035}Hey, {F843,0}. Are you here to help?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684031}All right.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684032}Come talk to me when you're ready.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684031}All right.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684032}Come talk to me when you're ready.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684036}Good. I'm going to start up the{F801}summoning program.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684037}I want you to stall the angels while{F801}it's summoning, {F843,0}.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684038}I'll summon Black Maria while you keep{F801}them at bay.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684039}Are you ready?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684036}Good. I'm going to start up the{F801}summoning program.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684037}I want you to stall the angels while{F801}it's summoning, {F843,0}.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684038}I'll summon Black Maria while you keep{F801}them at bay.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684039}Are you ready?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684040}All right, let's try this one more{F801}time.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684041}Are you ready?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684040}All right, let's try this one more{F801}time.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684041}Are you ready?{F801}

entry.source: 〉 You could not protect Nozomi...{F801}{F802}〉 The ritual has failed.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 You could not protect Nozomi...{F801}{F802}〉 The ritual has failed.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684042}Looks like we managed to do it!{F801}It's all thanks to you, {F843,0}.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684043}All right, here we go!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684042}Looks like we managed to do it!{F801}It's all thanks to you, {F843,0}.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684043}All right, here we go!{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The Lady Black Maria has been{F801}summoned.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The Lady Black Maria has been{F801}summoned.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-247}Oh, so beautiful...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-247}Oh, so beautiful...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-234}{F813,0,684045}Black Maria...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684046}We hired a human to summon you here.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684047}We are the Tuatha De Danann...{F801}Your people, Lady Danu.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684048}Please, retake your original form as{F801}Lady Danu, and lead us once again!{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684049}The fairy race has dispersed, and we{F801}have lost our power.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684050}We need your strength, Lady Danu!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-234}{F813,0,684045}Black Maria...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684046}We hired a human to summon you here.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684047}We are the Tuatha De Danann...{F801}Your people, Lady Danu.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684048}Please, retake your original form as{F801}Lady Danu, and lead us once again!{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684049}The fairy race has dispersed, and we{F801}have lost our power.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684050}We need your strength, Lady Danu!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Black Maria\0{F87A,-367}{F813,0,684051}...I see.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684052}You have suffered many hardships{F801}during my absence.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684053}...However, I carry the responsibility{F801}of my role as Black Maria.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684054}I cannot return to my previous{F801}life as Danu.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684055}Just as there are many who wish for{F801}the resurrection of the Lady...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684056}...There are far more who need this{F801}personification of the Holy Mother to{F801}exist.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Black Maria\0{F87A,-367}{F813,0,684051}...I see.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684052}You have suffered many hardships{F801}during my absence.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684053}...However, I carry the responsibility{F801}of my role as Black Maria.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684054}I cannot return to my previous{F801}life as Danu.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684055}Just as there are many who wish for{F801}the resurrection of the Lady...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684056}...There are far more who need this{F801}personification of the Holy Mother to{F801}exist.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-234}{F813,0,684057}No...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684058}Then is the fairy race doomed to{F801}perish?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-234}{F813,0,684057}No...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684058}Then is the fairy race doomed to{F801}perish?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Black Maria\0{F87A,-367}{F813,0,684059}No. I will not allow such a thing to{F801}happen.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684060}I shall find another to lead the{F801}fairies...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684061}Someone who can carry on the powers of{F801}Danu.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684062}Fortunately, a suitable successor is{F801}close at hand.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684063}Nozomi.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684064}I realize that asking this of you is{F801}selfish on my part.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684065}But, in exchange for the power of Danu{F801}and the protection of the fairies...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684066}I would like you to become the leader{F801}of the fairy people.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684067}This is the reason you were chosen to{F801}be the one to carry out this request.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684068}I planned on you being the one to{F801}summon me, so that I would be able to{F801}ask this of you.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Black Maria\0{F87A,-367}{F813,0,684059}No. I will not allow such a thing to{F801}happen.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684060}I shall find another to lead the{F801}fairies...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684061}Someone who can carry on the powers of{F801}Danu.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684062}Fortunately, a suitable successor is{F801}close at hand.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684063}Nozomi.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684064}I realize that asking this of you is{F801}selfish on my part.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684065}But, in exchange for the power of Danu{F801}and the protection of the fairies...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684066}I would like you to become the leader{F801}of the fairy people.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684067}This is the reason you were chosen to{F801}be the one to carry out this request.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684068}I planned on you being the one to{F801}summon me, so that I would be able to{F801}ask this of you.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684069}Me, lead the fairies...?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684070}But, I'm just a normal human!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684069}Me, lead the fairies...?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684070}But, I'm just a normal human!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Black Maria\0{F87A,-367}{F813,0,684071}It does not matter if the leader is{F801}a child of man.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684072}Just as my counterpart Mary did, it is{F801}more than possible for humans to enter{F801}realms normally reserved to gods.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684073}True, such great power can twist the{F801}fate of a child of man.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684074}Some girls have received such power,{F801}only to be persecuted as witches and{F801}meet sad fates.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684075}Such is the power that I would bestow{F801}to you. But, I will not force you to{F801}make this decision now.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Black Maria\0{F87A,-367}{F813,0,684071}It does not matter if the leader is{F801}a child of man.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684072}Just as my counterpart Mary did, it is{F801}more than possible for humans to enter{F801}realms normally reserved to gods.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684073}True, such great power can twist the{F801}fate of a child of man.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684074}Some girls have received such power,{F801}only to be persecuted as witches and{F801}meet sad fates.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684075}Such is the power that I would bestow{F801}to you. But, I will not force you to{F801}make this decision now.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684076}...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684077}Hey, {F843,0}... I'm kinda overwhelmed{F801}by all this right now.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684078}Do you think I'm cut out to do{F801}something like this? What should I do?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684076}...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684077}Hey, {F843,0}... I'm kinda overwhelmed{F801}by all this right now.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684078}Do you think I'm cut out to do{F801}something like this? What should I do?{F801}

entry.source: "Lead the fairies."{F801}"You can do it."{F801}"This isn't your job."{F801}"I don't know what to say."{F801}
entry.target: "Lead the fairies."{F801}"You can do it."{F801}"This isn't your job."{F801}"I don't know what to say."{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684079}...Yeah, you're right. I mean, I've{F801}already gone this far.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684080}Might as well see it through to the{F801}end, right?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684079}...Yeah, you're right. I mean, I've{F801}already gone this far.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684080}Might as well see it through to the{F801}end, right?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684081}Thanks.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684082}Hearing that you believe in me gives{F801}me confidence.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684083}Yep. I've made up my mind.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684081}Thanks.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684082}Hearing that you believe in me gives{F801}me confidence.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684083}Yep. I've made up my mind.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684084}Thanks for worrying about me.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684085}But, I've already decided that I'm{F801}gonna give it my all.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684086}I didn't expect things to go this far.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684087}But I do want to help the fairies.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684084}Thanks for worrying about me.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684085}But, I've already decided that I'm{F801}gonna give it my all.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684086}I didn't expect things to go this far.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684087}But I do want to help the fairies.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684088}...You're right. This is something I{F801}need to decide for myself.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684089}...I'm gonna do it. I'm gonna give{F801}it my all.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684088}...You're right. This is something I{F801}need to decide for myself.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684089}...I'm gonna do it. I'm gonna give{F801}it my all.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684090}Please, let me do this.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684091}I really do want to help the fairies.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684092}If you'll give me the power to do{F801}that, then I'll gladly take it.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684090}Please, let me do this.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684091}I really do want to help the fairies.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684092}If you'll give me the power to do{F801}that, then I'll gladly take it.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Black Maria\0{F87A,-367}{F813,0,684093}Thank you, Nozomi.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684094}Please, come closer.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Black Maria\0{F87A,-367}{F813,0,684093}Thank you, Nozomi.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684094}Please, come closer.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Black Maria places her hand on{F801}Nozomi's forehead.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Black Maria places her hand on{F801}Nozomi's forehead.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Black Maria\0{F87A,-367}{F813,0,684095}The transfer of power has been{F801}completed.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684096}From this point forth, Nozomi, you are{F801}the leader of the fairy people.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684097}And, one day, you shall become the{F801}Lady Danu, and the fairy race shall{F801}thrive once more.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Black Maria\0{F87A,-367}{F813,0,684095}The transfer of power has been{F801}completed.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684096}From this point forth, Nozomi, you are{F801}the leader of the fairy people.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684097}And, one day, you shall become the{F801}Lady Danu, and the fairy race shall{F801}thrive once more.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Black Maria\0{F87A,-367}{F813,0,684099}I must return.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684100}Thank you, Nozomi.{F801}Thank you, {F843,0}.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684101}I, too, wish the best for the people{F801}who follow me as Black Maria.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684102}The best of luck to the both of us.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Black Maria\0{F87A,-367}{F813,0,684099}I must return.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684100}Thank you, Nozomi.{F801}Thank you, {F843,0}.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684101}I, too, wish the best for the people{F801}who follow me as Black Maria.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684102}The best of luck to the both of us.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Black Maria leaves...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Black Maria leaves...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684103}Hm. I don't feel all that different{F801}after whatever she did.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684104}Anyway, I'm going to try my best with{F801}the fairy race.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684105}I guess the first step's gotta be{F801}finding a place where the fairies can{F801}live in peace.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684103}Hm. I don't feel all that different{F801}after whatever she did.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684104}Anyway, I'm going to try my best with{F801}the fairy race.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684105}I guess the first step's gotta be{F801}finding a place where the fairies can{F801}live in peace.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Nozomi leaves with the fairies...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Nozomi leaves with the fairies...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684003}......{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684004}You see, the fairies here begged me to{F801}help them.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684005}They wanted me to summon a demon{F801}called Black Maria.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684006}The fairies seem desperate to meet{F801}this Maria.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684003}......{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684004}You see, the fairies here begged me to{F801}help them.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684005}They wanted me to summon a demon{F801}called Black Maria.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684006}The fairies seem desperate to meet{F801}this Maria.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684106}Thanks for everything.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684107}You know, I thought I was going to be{F801}your mentor as a Hunter and as a{F801}photographer...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684108}But then, I feel you've helped me out{F801}a lot more than I've helped you.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684109}From now on, though, I have to be able{F801}to get through things without your{F801}help.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684110}Well, see you around, {F843,0}.{F801}I'm really grateful for all you've{F801}done for me.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Nozomi\0{F87A,136}{F813,0,684106}Thanks for everything.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684107}You know, I thought I was going to be{F801}your mentor as a Hunter and as a{F801}photographer...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684108}But then, I feel you've helped me out{F801}a lot more than I've helped you.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684109}From now on, though, I have to be able{F801}to get through things without your{F801}help.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,684110}Well, see you around, {F843,0}.{F801}I'm really grateful for all you've{F801}done for me.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 According to the map, this place{F801}is called the "St. Nicholas{F801}Cathedral"...{F801}{F802}〉 A demon looks prepared to fight,{F801}but when it sees you, it sighs in{F801}relief...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 According to the map, this place{F801}is called the "St. Nicholas{F801}Cathedral"...{F801}{F802}〉 A demon looks prepared to fight,{F801}but when it sees you, it sighs in{F801}relief...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-246}{F813,1,411007}Oh, it's just a human.{F801}Don't freak me out like that.{F801}{F802}...This is the home of the fairies.{F801}Though there aren't many of us left{F801}by now.{F801}{F802}We just need to hold out only a little{F801}longer... With her help, we're sure to{F801}get through this...{F801}

With her help, we're sure to{F801}get through this...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 You have no more business here...{F801}
